japanese: そうだよ。/九郎は、生徒会に入りたいのか？
english: That's right. /Does Kuro want to join student council?

japanese: そうだ、!0さんは/どんな話だと思います？
english: Right, !0, /what kind of story /do you think it is?

japanese: そうじゃな、/そうも考えられるのう……。
english: That's right, /you could think of it that way...

japanese: そうすれば、醍醐先輩に/勝負を挑もうとする雑魚もいなくなって、/セイセイしますよ。
english: If you do that, weaklings /challenging Daigo-senpai will vanish, /and it'll be peaceful.

japanese: そうかぁ、/夏がやりたくないなら仕方ないな。
english: I see, if Natsu doesn't want to, /can't be helped.

japanese: そうだな。/炎に照らされて、全てがオレンジ色に/染まる世界も悪くない……
english: Yeah. /A world where everything turns orange /in the firelight isn't bad...

japanese: そうだな。/久しぶりの日本で、懐かしい友達にも/会えたしね。
english: Yeah. /Back in Japan after a while, /and met old friends too.

japanese: そうか？/本当にこれで十分なのか！？
english: Is that so? /Is this really enough!?

japanese: そうだね！/私も楽しみにとっとこ。/それじゃあね！
english: Yeah! /I'm looking forward to it too! /Well then!
